ADP Input-Output and Storage Devices - Maintenance
full_summary:
=================


### Contract Notice

GB-SSC-2023-023

#### Tender Title
Extension GPSC7 - fs7

#### Summary
Shared Services Canada (SSC) (French: Services partagés Canada) is inviting outstanding bidders to provide ADP input-output and storage devices maintenance services.

#### Important Dates

- **Publication Date**: December 5, 2023
- **Closing Date**: December 18, 2023 (at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time)
- **Contract Start Date**: TBA
- **Contract End Date**: TBA

#### Goods and Services Description

SSC GPSC7 - fs7 expansion, Amendment 000

#### Locations
- **Service Delivery Region**: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
- **Contracting Entity Location**: Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

#### Solicitation Number
BPM020223/24714

#### Contact Information

- **Name**: Raiyane Benchekroun
- **Phone**: (613) 324-4061
- **Fax**: (613) 960-6007
- **Alternate Contact Information**: 180 rue Kent St., 13 Floor, Ottawa, ON, K1G 4A8

#### Optional Attachment

Please visit the following links to access attachments:

- [Link 1](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/554E2A54-F00A-4844-B919-5B714D4E38D9)

Download these attachments in their respective official languages. Please make sure to save and consult them carefully before submitting a bid.

#### Trade Information

The proposed contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA). Bidders are advised to consult these documents to ensure compliance.
